reviewText:
There are only three episodes on this disc which can be found on the main volumes.
The episodes on this disc are:
1. The Pet Show (also found on Dinosaurs & Other Animal Adventures)
2. Meet the Parents (also found on All You Need Is Love and Pasta
3. Down on the Farm (also found on Dinosaurs & Other Animal Adventures)
There are no Garfield Shorts on this disk.
My Grandson and I loved this movie.  It was clean and entertaining!!!
